problem_text:
Let F be a soluble Fitting formation of finite groups with Kegel’s property,
that is, F contains every finite group of the form G = AB = BC = CA if A, B, C are
in F. Is F a saturated formation?
Comment of 2013: Some progress was made in (A. Ballester-Bolinches, L. M. Ez-
querro, J. Group Theory, 8, no. 5 (2005), 605–611).
A. F. Vasiliev
